videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: Jolly Balloon Man  Minsc and Boo  Zimone, Paradox Sculptor  Muldrotha  Commander MTG LIVE VOD
videos.description:
*Twitch VOD from 12-18-24*

The Worst Possible Commander show goes LIVE with their Secret Santa gift decks!

Format - Commander / EDH
Newest Set - Foundations

Commanders:
The Jolly Balloon Man
Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes
Simone Paradox, Sculptor
Muldrotha, the Gravetide

Decklists:
CGB: https://moxfield.com/decks/zWs8uJahjUyMf1tWTSlOoA
Blake: https://moxfield.com/decks/rSv2booiL0WpgghpCDlBTQ
Ben: https://moxfield.com/decks/7eAcOReZaEipWPyCHqxx9w
Shea: https://moxfield.com/decks/FlLJVxZzJ022LJxKnIl-YQ

Chapters
Intro: 00:00
Gameplay: 08:55
Outro: 01:46:57

Promo Code WORST for 5% off at CoolStuffInc.com
https://www.coolstuffinc.com/

Discord - https://discord.gg/MXt3DEP

Twitter:
CGB: @covertgoblue
Blake: @blake_mtg
Ben: @GreedLordMTG
Shea: @TheWorstShea

Title Music by Sam Plotkin - www.samplotkinmusic.com
Additional music by Rattlesnake
Logo design by HolyMTG - HolyMTG@gmail.com Twitter @HolyMTG
Worst Possible Commander Show Logo design by Brent Kruscke

A commander show focused on bringing great in-person paper gameplay. This show features a consistent cast, including Covertgoblue.
